**How to Redeem and Quick Q&A**

 * Only active clients of the above-mentioned hosts are eligible for the promo via bill credit.

 * Only first-time NexusBytes Customers are eligible for this promo.

 * Customer/User must signup with Quarterly Payment Options. User will pay for the first 3 months, NexusBytes will credit for the reminder 3 months. Total 6 months for the price of 3 to offset your loss and damage. If you chose to pay yearly, you will still be eligible for the credit. Please open a ticket before paying your invoice so we can adjust it.

 * User must submit a copy of their **most recent** invoice paid to the above-mentioned hosts and also a screenshot of their current product status from their client area VIA Sales ticket after they have paid their first invoice.

 * Only NVMe plans are eligible for discount.
 
 * No additional discount will be offered.

 * We may offer custom plans,  please contact via ticket.

 * If you are not interested in the promo credit but rather want a price match, we *may* be able to assist. Please open a ticket. We can not promise but we can try. Our vision 2020 is not to Deadpool, hence we will not honor any crazy annual deal. Please only use our helpdesk if you would prefer to have the price match option.

 * We can not assist with the data transfer/backup restoration.

 * Our NVMe Plans are powered by AMD Ryzen 7 3700x CPU. Fair share policy applies.

 * Windows server 19 standard edition license is available for free with any plan with more than 2GB Ram and paid annually.
